reservationDesc:
You are searching for books and can add them to the shopping cart. At the reservation page you can add all books from the shopping cart to a reservation. All details are optional.

The records are tied to a branch and can only be viewed by that branch. Everybody is allowed to delete a reservation - all books must be marked as sold or removed.

A book can be removed from the reservation by opening the book for editing and removing the tick in front of "Reserved".
